It is not as drastic as that! You can do this sort of thing with JavaScript and HTML, but it is not straightforward. This may help:
https://github.com/ThePix/quest/wiki/Advanced-UI-Part-01:-Concepts
https://github.com/ThePix/quest/wiki/Advanced-UI-Part-02:-New-Status-Pane

You need access to the full code view, so this would be for the desktop version only. It _may_ be possible to do it in the web version too, but would need some adapting.
